revised_title: Effects of an Isolated Irregularity on Wave Transmission in Periodically Ribbed Fluid-Loaded Elastic Structures
tldr: The study investigates the impact of an isolated irregularity on the transmission of energy in fluid-loaded elastic structures with periodically spaced ribs. The research finds that irregularities significantly reduce energy transmission in pass bands and decrease the power input to the system, while having minimal effects in stop bands. The findings can be applied to the design and optimization of fluid-loaded elastic structures in engineering applications.
